message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a novel approach to visualize important features used in classification decisions of point cloud networks. The approach is based on gradually smoothing parts of the point cloud, which is similar to visualizing 2-D convolutional networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses the mechanisms of point cloud networks, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper proposes a technical contribution of an approximated curvature smoothing algorithm, which could be relevant to cs.GR (Graphics) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
